title: WRAP: Rugby World Cup results - Week 4
text:
Cape Town - A comprehensive wrap of all the fixtures, kick-off times, results and match reports for all the Week 4 Rugby World Cup matches.

TUESDAY, OCTOBER 8

South Africa 66-7 Canada - MATCH REPORT



WEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 9

Argentina 47-17 USA - MATCH REPORT



Scotland 61-0 Russia - MATCH REPORT



Wales 29-17 Fiji - MATCH REPORT



FRIDAY, OCTOBER 11

Australia v Georgia - 12:15

SATURDAY, OCTOBER 12

Italy v New Zealand - CANCELLED

France v England - CANCELLED



Samoa v Ireland - 12:45

SUNDAY, OCTOBER 13

Canada v Namibia - 05:15

Tonga v USA - 07:45

Uruguay v Wales - 10:15

Scotland v Japan - 12:45
description: A comprehensive wrap of all the fixtures, kick-off times, results and match reports for all the Week 4 Rugby World Cup matches.
